sentences.en: a leftward swing in public opinion
sentences.cn: 舆论向左转变

sentences.en: a porch swing
sentences.cn: 门廊上的秋千

sentences.en: a sign swinging in the wind
sentences.cn: 在风中摇摆的指示牌

sentences.en: Can you swing him round to our point of view?
sentences.cn: 你能不能让他转向我们的观点?

sentences.en: He shouldered the loaded carrying pole and walked off with a swing.
sentences.cn: 他挑起担子颤悠颤悠地走了.

sentences.en: He took a swing at (= tried to hit ) my head and missed.
sentences.cn: 他挥拳向我头部打来，但没有打中

sentences.en: He was swinging his bag back and forth .
sentences.cn: 他前后甩动着他的包。

sentences.en: Her mood could swing rapidly from gloom to exhilaration.
sentences.cn: 她的情绪可能在转瞬之间从阴郁转向兴奋.

sentences.en: His moods swing alarmingly.
sentences.cn: 他的心情时好时坏，令人担心。

sentences.en: I took a swing at him and knocked him silly.
sentences.cn: 我挥拳打了他一下,把他打得晕头转向.

sentences.en: Keep the head of the club the same height throughout the swing.
sentences.cn: 整个挥杆过程中要使杆头始终保持在同一高度。

sentences.en: Keeping your back straight, swing one leg backwards.
sentences.cn: 挺直腰背，一条腿向后摆动。

sentences.en: kids playing on the swings
sentences.cn: 荡秋千的孩子们

sentences.en: Let your arms swing as you walk.
sentences.cn: 边走边摆动双臂。

sentences.en: Oil prices continued an upward swing in New York this morning.
sentences.cn: 今天上午纽约油价继续上扬。

sentences.en: She swung her legs from side to side .
sentences.cn: 她左右晃动着两条腿。

sentences.en: She was swinging a bottle of wine by its neck.
sentences.cn: 她当时正在握着瓶颈摇晃酒瓶。

sentences.en: Sure he can swing a new car on his income.
sentences.cn: 按他的收入,他是买得起一辆新车的.

sentences.en: That's more like it, you're getting into the swing of things now.
sentences.cn: 这才对了嘛，你现在慢慢开始熟悉情况了。

sentences.en: the advantages of a small company over a large one is a matter of swings and roundabouts.
sentences.cn: 说小公司比大公司有优势也是个相对的问题。

sentences.en: The sail of the little boat swung crazily from one side to the other.
sentences.cn: 这艘小船的船帆发疯似地左右摇晃着。

sentences.en: the swing of her hips as she walked
sentences.cn: 她走路时臀部的摇摆

sentences.en: There will be a radical swing to the right or the left.
sentences.cn: 这样将出现极左或极右的情况。

sentences.en: When your father comes home, you'll swing for it!
sentences.cn: 等你爸爸回来, 你会为这事受惩罚的.

sentences.en: You must allow the clubhead to swing freely.
sentences.cn: 必须让杆头一气呵成地挥出。

sentences.en: You've been on the swing for ten minutes, it's my go now.
sentences.cn: 你荡秋千有10分钟了, 现在该轮到我了.

words.tran_cn: 活跃的；极好的；多姿多彩的；性放任的
摆动的人；赶时髦的人；乱搞男女关系的人；巨大的事物
摇摆（swing的现在分词）；鞭打（swinge的现在分词）
旋转的；悬挂的；强节奏爵士音乐的
摇摆；摆动；秋千；音律；涨落
摇摆；转向；悬挂；大摇大摆地行走

phrases.tran_cn: 达到活动的高潮；全力进行中

phrases.phrase: get (back) into the swing of things
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)对活动（或程序）开始（或重新）熟悉
(非正式)（聚会或其他事件）生动活泼的，令人愉快的
处于活动或运作的最高水准
旋启式止回阀；摆动式止回阀
回转门；两面皆可推拉开关的门
发挥个人的影响(或权势)
内关门；外摆式；向舷外转
(英)有所得也有所失的情况；失之东隅，收之桑榆

trans.tran_cn: 旋转的；悬挂的；强节奏爵士音乐的
摆动，秋千，摇摆乐，改变，巡回
trans.tran_en: a type of dance music played by a big band in the 1930s and 1940s that is similar to  jazz
to make regular movements forwards and backwards or from one side to another while hanging from a particular point, or to make something do this

trans.tran_cn: 使摆动，纵身跃向，（使）弧线运动，转弯，急转身，朝…打去，改变
trans.tran_en: to make regular movements forwards and backwards or from one side to another while hanging from a particular point, or to make something do this
to make regular movements forwards and backwards or from one side to another while hanging from a particular point, or to make something do this
to make regular movements forwards and backwards or from one side to another while hanging from a particular point, or to make something do this
